alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Crawford; Franklin; Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 11 at 10:08PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Benton, Madison, northeastern Franklin, Carroll, northeastern Crawford and eastern Washington Counties through 1115 PM CST... At 1007 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles south of War Eagle to 5 miles southeast of Elkins to near Chester. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Berryville... Huntsville... Eureka Springs... Green Forest... Elkins... Winslow... Chester... St. Paul... Hindsville... Wesley... Carrollton... Rudd... Saint Paul... Forum... Aurora... Hobbs State Park... Clifty... Boston... Withrow Springs State Park... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 34 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Benton; Carroll; Crawford; Franklin; Madison; Washington
